Lyric:
[00:18.770]I never felt nothing in the world like this before
[00:22.650]Now I'm missing you
[00:23.770]And I'm wishing that you would come back through my door
[00:28.590]Why did you have to go?
[00:30.530]You could have let me know
[00:32.720]So now I'm all alone
[00:35.600]Girl you could have stayed
[00:36.970]But you wouldn't give me a chance
[00:39.160]With you not around it's a little bit more then I can stand
[00:45.100]And all my tears they keep running down my face
[00:49.470]Why did you turn away?
[00:51.910]So why does your pride make you run and hide?
[00:56.040]Are you that afraid of me?
[01:00.600]But I know it's a lie what you keep inside
[01:03.970]This is not how you wanted to be
[01:08.470]So baby I will wait for you
[01:11.850]Cause I don't know what else I can do
[01:16.040]Don't tell me I ran out of time
[01:20.310]If it takes the rest of my life
[01:24.750]Baby I will wait for you
[01:28.680]If you think I'm fine it just aint true
[01:31.870]I really need you in my life
[01:37.060]No matter what I have to do I'll wait for you
[01:41.680]It's been a long time since you called me
[01:47.500]How could you forget about me
[01:51.560]You got me feeling crazy crazy
[01:53.310]Oooooo
[01:53.560]How can you walk away
[01:54.810]Everything stays the same
[01:55.750]I just can't do it baby
[01:59.760]What will it take to make you come back
[02:02.870]Girl I told you what it is and it just ain't like that
[02:07.190]Why can't you look at me
[02:09.250]Your still in love with me
[02:12.910]Don't leave me crying.
[02:14.620]Baby why can't we just start over again
[02:19.000]Get it back to the way it was
[02:24.430]If you give me a chance I can love you right
[02:26.750]But your telling me it wont be enough
[02:29.260]So baby I will wait for you
[02:35.950]Cause I don''t know what else I can do
[02:38.570]Don't tell me I ran out of time
[02:43.070]If it takes the rest of my life
[02:47.620]Baby I will wait for you
[02:51.120]If you think I'm fine it just aint true
[02:54.190]I really need you in my life
[02:58.170]No matter what I have to do I'll wait for you
[03:05.180]So why does you pride make you run & hide
[03:09.620]Are you that afraid of me?
[03:12.880]But I know it's a lie what your keeping inside
[03:16.750]That is not how you wanted to be
[03:21.660]Baby I will wait for you
[03:30.100]Baby I will wait for you
[03:33.040]If it's the last thing I do
[03:37.530]So baby I will wait for you
[03:41.180]Cause I don''t know what else I can do
[03:44.940]Don't tell me I ran out of time
[03:49.750]If it takes the rest of my life
[03:54.400]Baby I will wait for you
[03:58.230]If you think I'm fine it just aint true
[04:03.590]I really need you in my life
[04:05.060]No matter what I have to do I'll wait for you
[04:13.900]I'll Be Waiting.
[98:59.700]
